Traditional.name: Classic
Traditional.description: Timeless and elegant with formal attire, traditional vows, and classic color palettes like white, ivory, and gold.

Traditional.name: Formal
Traditional.description: A black-tie event with upscale décor, a sit-down dinner, and often held in a ballroom or luxury venue.

Traditional.name: Black Tie
Traditional.description: Ultra-formal evening wedding where guests wear tuxedos and floor-length gowns.

Traditional.name: Religious Ceremony
Traditional.description: Traditional ceremonies rooted in religious customs and held in places of worship.

Traditional.name: Ballroom
Traditional.description: Grand and elegant with chandeliers, marble floors, and a sophisticated atmosphere.

Modern.name: Minimalist
Modern.description: Clean lines, neutral tones, and simple décor focused on quality over quantity.

Modern.name: Urban/City Chic
Modern.description: Sleek and modern, often in lofts, art galleries, or rooftop venues in metropolitan areas.

Modern.name: Art Deco
Modern.description: Inspired by the 1920s with geometric patterns, metallics, and a touch of vintage glamour.

Modern.name: Contemporary
Modern.description: Trendy and stylish with up-to-date designs, often mixing unique layouts and color schemes.

Modern.name: Industrial
Modern.description: Exposed brick, metal fixtures, and a raw, edgy vibe, often set in warehouses or lofts.

Romantic.name: Fairy Tale
Romantic.description: Inspired by fantasy and magic, with dramatic gowns, castles, and whimsical elements.

Romantic.name: Garden Party
Romantic.description: Floral-focused with soft colors and an outdoor setting, ideal for spring or summer weddings.

Romantic.name: Whimsical
Romantic.description: Playful and dreamy, often with colorful palettes, creative themes, and unique touches.

Romantic.name: Soft & Dreamy
Romantic.description: Pastels, flowing fabrics, and delicate details like candlelight and lace.

Romantic.name: Vintage Romance
Romantic.description: Inspired by bygone eras (like the 1920s or 1950s) with antique decor and nostalgic elegance.

Rustic.name: Barn Wedding
Rustic.description: Held in a barn or farm setting, with wooden décor, string lights, and country charm.

Rustic.name: Country
Rustic.description: Laid-back and homey, often featuring cowboy boots, BBQ, and folk music.

Rustic.name: Boho Rustic
Rustic.description: A mix of bohemian and rustic elements with natural textures, macramé, and earthy tones.

Rustic.name: Woodland/Forest
Rustic.description: Nature-centric weddings held in the woods, with moss, greenery, and a fairy-tale feel.

Rustic.name: Farmhouse
Rustic.description: Cozy and simple with a farmhouse venue, vintage accents, and farm-to-table catering.

Bohemian.name: Free-Spirited
Bohemian.description: Carefree and non-traditional with natural materials, dreamcatchers, and relaxed styling.

Bohemian.name: Eclectic
Bohemian.description: A creative mix of styles, patterns, and colors for a personalized, artsy vibe.

Bohemian.name: Earthy
Bohemian.description: Inspired by nature with wooden elements, organic foods, and wildflowers.

Bohemian.name: Outdoor Boho
Bohemian.description: A bohemian wedding in nature—deserts, beaches, or gardens—with rugs, low seating, and tapestries.

Bohemian.name: Festival-Inspired
Bohemian.description: Music-festival vibe with food trucks, live bands, tents, and an all-night party.

Beach & Coastal.name: Beachfront
Beach & Coastal.description: Laid-back ceremonies on the sand with barefoot vows and ocean views.

Beach & Coastal.name: Tropical
Beach & Coastal.description: Bright colors, palm leaves, exotic flowers, and tropical cocktails.

Beach & Coastal.name: Nautical
Beach & Coastal.description: Anchors, navy and white stripes, and coastal décor with a maritime feel.

Beach & Coastal.name: Coastal Chic
Beach & Coastal.description: Sophisticated seaside vibe with soft blues, white linens, and elegant minimalism.

Glamorous.name: Luxury
Glamorous.description: Opulent design with upscale venues, high-end fashion, and gourmet food.

Glamorous.name: Hollywood Glam
Glamorous.description: Inspired by red-carpet style with dramatic lighting, bold colors, and sparkle.

Glamorous.name: Gold & Glitz
Glamorous.description: Metallics, sequins, and grandeur—ideal for couples who want a show-stopping aesthetic.

Glamorous.name: Crystal Accents
Glamorous.description: Elegant and sparkling with crystal chandeliers, tableware, and accessories.

Cultural & Themed.name: Cultural Fusion
Cultural & Themed.description: Blending traditions from multiple cultures into a meaningful, unified celebration.

Cultural & Themed.name: Destination Wedding
Cultural & Themed.description: Weddings held abroad or in a dream location, combining ceremony and vacation.

Cultural & Themed.name: Vintage Era
Cultural & Themed.description: Themed around specific decades like the Roaring '20s, Rockabilly '50s, or Groovy '70s.

Cultural & Themed.name: Fantasy or Fandom Inspired
Cultural & Themed.description: Themed weddings based on books, movies, or games (e.g., Harry Potter, Star Wars).

Cultural & Themed.name: Traditional Ethnic
Cultural & Themed.description: Culturally rich weddings following traditions like Indian, Chinese, Jewish, Nigerian, etc.

Casual & Fun.name: Backyard Wedding
Casual & Fun.description: Simple and intimate celebrations held in a private backyard with a cozy atmosphere.

Casual & Fun.name: Elopement
Casual & Fun.description: A private, often spontaneous wedding with just the couple or a few close witnesses.

Casual & Fun.name: Brunch Wedding
Casual & Fun.description: Morning or early afternoon wedding with breakfast-style food and a laid-back tone.

Casual & Fun.name: Pop-Up Wedding
Casual & Fun.description: Short, affordable weddings with minimal planning, often in public or surprise locations.

Casual & Fun.name: DIY
Casual & Fun.description: Hands-on and creative, with homemade decorations and personalized touches.

Seasonal.name: Spring Garden
Seasonal.description: Lush flowers, pastel colors, and fresh seasonal décor set in a garden or greenhouse.

Seasonal.name: Summer Tropical
Seasonal.description: Bright and vibrant with summer blooms, fruity cocktails, and outdoor ceremonies.

Seasonal.name: Autumn Harvest
Seasonal.description: Warm tones, pumpkins, and rustic décor inspired by fall’s colors and textures.

Seasonal.name: Winter Wonderland
Seasonal.description: Cool tones, snow-inspired décor, candlelight, and cozy elements for a magical feel.
